8. Sc√©narios de test et r√©sultats

int main() {
    Robot* r1 = new WheeledRobot("Rover", 4);
    Robot* r2 = new FlyingRobot("Eagle", 1200.0);

    r1->move(5.0, 3.0);
    r2->move(2.0, -1.0);

    delete r1;
    delete r2;
    return 0;
}

Sorties console : WheeledRobot Rover rolls by (5, 3) on 4 wheels. FlyingRobot Eagle flies to (2, -1, 0) at altitude 1200.
